66279.name: Fatal accidents per million commercial flights (ASN)
66279.datasetName: Fatal aviation accidents & fatalties - Aviation Safety Network (ASN)
66279.s_name: Fatal aviation accidents & fatalties - Aviation Safety Network (ASN)

source.name: Fatal aviation accidents & fatalties - Aviation Safety Network (ASN)
source.dataPublisherSource: Information contained in the Aviation Safety Network database is based on information from official sources (authorities, safety boards).
source.additionalInfo:
Data on fatal accidents, hijacking incidents and numbers of fatalities are based on airliners of 14+ passengers, and do not include corporate jet and military transport accidents.

Air traffic figures are based on the number of airliner flight departures (not the number of passengers) per year.
